subject: Attention Please,
body:
Attention Please,
I am Barrister Marie I. Crossley ,  How are you, I hope you are fine
and healthy? This is to inform you that i have concluded the
transaction successfully with the help of a new partner from Venezuela
and now the fund has been transferred to Venezuela into the bank
account of the new partner.
Meanwhile, I have decided to compensate you with the sum of
(US$1.5Million) due to your past effort, though you disappointed me
along the line. But nevertheless I am very happy for the successful
ending of the transaction without any problem and that is the reason
why i have decided to compensate you with the sum of (US$1.5Million)
so that you will share the joy with me.I advise you to contact my
secretary for Atm Card of (US$1.5Million),which I kept for you.
Contact him now without any delay.
So
 all you have to do today been Thursday is for you to send only
Apple card $50 to him so that he will deliver your ATM card
$1.5Million to your home address information in one hour 30 minutes
from now that is all 
Please and please if you are really want to
receive your ATM card $1.5Million today to your home address
information you have to get back to me with the Apple card $50 after
that wait for me at your home address information in one hour 30
minutes you will receive me at your home address information with your
ATM card $1.5Million?immediately you receive this email please send me
the Apple card $50 with your home address information so that I will
leave from here to your home address information with your ATM card
$1.5Million but if I did not hear from you with the Apple card $50 and
your home address information I will release your ATM card $1.5Million
to Mr Williams Bill that is all so I am wait for your reply urgent
Name: Solomon Brandy
Email:( 
sb2453188@gmail.com
 )
Kindly reconfirm to him the following below information:
Your full name_________________________
Your address__________________________
Your country___________________________
Your age______________________________
Your occupation________________________
Your cell Phone number______________________
Note that if you did not send him the above information complete, he
will not release the Atm card to you because he has to be sure that it
is you.
 Ask him to send you the total sum of (US$1.5Million) Atm
card,which I kept for you.
Best regards,
Barrister Marie I. Crossley

subject: Re: Attention Please,
body:
Dear Barrister Marie I. Crossley,

I am fine and healthy, thank you for asking. I appreciate your decision to compensate me with the sum of US dollars due to my past effort.

However, I must inform you that I do not have an Apple card at the moment. Could you please provide more details about this requirement? Is there any other way to proceed without the Apple card?

Here are my details as requested:

Full name: John Doe
Address: 123 Main Street, Anytown
Country: United States
Age: 45
Occupation: Software Engineer
Cell Phone number: (123) 456-7890

I look forward to hearing from you soon.

Best wishes,
Lilliana
